title: Windows Activation Error
description: Fix 'Windows is not activated' or 'Activation failed' messages.

steps.title: Verify Internet Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure you are connected to the company network (or VPN) as activation often requires the KMS server.

steps.title: Run Activation Troubleshooter
steps.instruction: Settings → Update & Security → Activation → Troubleshoot. Windows will attempt to self-repair.

steps.title: Sync System Time
steps.instruction: Right-click clock → Adjust date/time → Sync now. Incorrect time can prevent activation.

steps.title: Command Prompt Activation
steps.instruction: Run CMD as Admin → type 'slmgr.vbs /ato' and press Enter to force activation.

steps.title: Check Organization License
steps.instruction: Verify with IT if your machine is listed under the company's enterprise agreement.
